con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://atradius.com/connect/_2007_08/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:connect="http://atradius.com/connect/_2007_08/"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://atradius.com/connect/_2007_08/" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="qualified"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="CoverApplication.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="IndicationRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyForIndication"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="IndicationResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyForIndicationResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditCheckRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:checkCredit"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditCheckResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:checkCreditResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditLimitRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyForCreditLimit"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CreditLimitResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyForCreditLimitResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="NoRiskOpinionRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:getNoRiskOpinion"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="NoRiskOpinionResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:getNoRiskOpinionResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SpecialProductRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyForSpecialProduct"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SpecialProductResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyForSpecialProductResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededCreditCheckRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeCreditCheck"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededCreditCheckResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeCreditCheckResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededCreditLimitRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeCreditLimit"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededCreditLimitResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeCreditLimitResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededNoRiskOpinionRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeNoRiskOpinion"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededNoRiskOpinionResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeNoRiskOpinionResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededSpecialProductRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeSpecialProduct"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededSpecialProductResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeSpecialProductResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CoverForBuyerRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyCoverForBuyer"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CoverForBuyerResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyCoverForBuyerResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ConnectFault"> <wsdl:part name="reason" element="connect:ConnectException"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededIndicationRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeIndication"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SupersededIndicationResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:supersedeIndicationResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="IndicationForBuyerRequestMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyIndicationForBuyer"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="IndicationForBuyerResponseMessage"> <wsdl:part name="param" element="connect:applyIndicationForBuyerResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="CoverApplication"> <wsdl:operation name="checkCredit"> <wsdl:input name="CreditCheckApplication" message="connect:CreditCheckRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="CreditCheckDecision" message="connect:CreditCheckResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyForCreditLimit"> <wsdl:input name="CreditLimitApplication" message="connect:CreditLimitRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="CreditLimitDecision" message="connect:CreditLimitResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getNoRiskOpinion"> <wsdl:input name="NoRiskOpinionApplication" message="connect:NoRiskOpinionRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="NoRiskOpinionDecision" message="connect:NoRiskOpinionResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyForSpecialProduct"> <wsdl:input name="SpecialProductApplication" message="connect:SpecialProductRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="SpecialProductDecision" message="connect:SpecialProductResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeCreditCheck"> <wsdl:input name="CreditCheckSupersedingApplication" message="connect:SupersededCreditCheckRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="CreditCheckSupersedingDecision" message="connect:SupersededCreditCheckResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeCreditLimit"> <wsdl:input name="CreditLimitSupersedingApplication" message="connect:SupersededCreditLimitRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="CreditLimitSupersedingDecision" message="connect:SupersededCreditLimitResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeNoRiskOpinion"> <wsdl:input name="NoRiskOpinionSupersedingApplication" message="connect:SupersededNoRiskOpinionRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="NoRiskOpinionSupersedingDecision" message="connect:SupersededNoRiskOpinionResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeSpecialProduct"> <wsdl:input name="SpecialProductSupersedingApplication" message="connect:SupersededSpecialProductRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="SpecialProductSupersedingDecision" message="connect:SupersededSpecialProductResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyCoverForBuyer"> <wsdl:input name="CoverForBuyerApplication" message="connect:CoverForBuyerRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="CoverForBuyerDecision" message="connect:CoverForBuyerResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyForIndication"> <wsdl:input name="IndicationApplication" message="connect:IndicationRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="IndicationDecision" message="connect:IndicationResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeIndication"> <wsdl:input name="IndicationSupersedingApplication" message="connect:SupersededIndicationRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="IndicationSupersedingDecision" message="connect:SupersededIndicationResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyIndicationForBuyer"> <wsdl:input name="IndicationForBuyerApplication" message="connect:IndicationForBuyerRequestMessage"/> <wsdl:output name="IndicationForBuyerDecision" message="connect:IndicationForBuyerResponseMessage"/> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException" message="connect:ConnectFault"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="CoverApplication" type="connect:CoverApplication"> <wsdl:documentation> <wsi:Claim conformsTo="http://ws-i.org/profiles/basic/1.0" xmlns:wsi="http://ws-i.org/schemas/conformanceClaim/"/> </wsdl:documentation> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="checkCredit"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:checkCredit" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="CreditCheckApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="CreditCheckDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyForCreditLimit"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:applyForCreditLimit" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="CreditLimitApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="CreditLimitDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getNoRiskOpinion"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:getNoRiskOpinion" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="NoRiskOpinionApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="NoRiskOpinionDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyForSpecialProduct"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:applyForSpecialProduct" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="SpecialProductApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="SpecialProductDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeCreditCheck"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:supersedeCreditCheck" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="CreditCheckSupersedingApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="CreditCheckSupersedingDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeCreditLimit"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:supersedeCreditLimit" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="CreditLimitSupersedingApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="CreditLimitSupersedingDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeNoRiskOpinion"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:supersedeNoRiskOpinion" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="NoRiskOpinionSupersedingApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="NoRiskOpinionSupersedingDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeSpecialProduct"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:supersedeSpecialProduct" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="SpecialProductSupersedingApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="SpecialProductSupersedingDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyCoverForBuyer"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:applyCoverForBuyer" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="CoverForBuyerApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="CoverForBuyerDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyForIndication"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:applyForIndication" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="IndicationApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="IndicationDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="supersedeIndication"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:supersedeIndication" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="IndicationSupersedingApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="IndicationSupersedingDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="applyIndicationForBuyer"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:applyIndicationForBuyer" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="IndicationForBuyerApplication"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="IndicationForBuyerDecision"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="CoverApplicationException"> <soap:fault name="CoverApplicationException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="AtradiusConnectApplicationService"> <wsdl:documentation>Atradius Connect Service for application operations</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:port name="CoverApplication" binding="connect:CoverApplication"> <soap:address location="https://servatnettest.atradius.com/FATFConnectWS/services/CoverApplication"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://atradius.com/connect/_2007_08/" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:connect="http://atradius.com/connect/_2007_08/" xmlns:connecterr="http://atradius.com/services/exception/_2006_12_15/exception"> <!--Import--> <xsd:import namespace="http://atradius.com/services/exception/_2006_12_15/exception" schemaLocation="../xsd/Exception/WSException.xsd"/> <xsd:include schemaLocation="../xsd/CoverDefinition.xsd"/> <!--Element Definition--> <xsd:element name="checkCredit" type="connect:OperationBasicType"/> <xsd:element name="checkCreditResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="applyForCreditLimit" type="connect:OperationCreditLimitType"/> <xsd:element name="applyForCreditLimitResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="getNoRiskOpinion" type="connect:OperationCreditLimitType"/> <xsd:element name="getNoRiskOpinionResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="applyForSpecialProduct" type="connect:OperationCreditLimitType"/> <xsd:element name="applyForSpecialProductResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeCreditCheck" type="connect:OperationSupersedBasicType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeCreditCheckResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeCreditLimit" type="connect:OperationSupersededCreditLimitType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeIndication" type="connect:OperationSupersededCreditLimitType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeCreditLimitResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeIndicationResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeNoRiskOpinion" type="connect:OperationSupersededCreditLimitType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeNoRiskOpinionResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeSpecialProduct" type="connect:OperationSupersededCreditLimitType"/> <xsd:element name="supersedeSpecialProductResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="applyCoverForBuyer" type="connect:OperationCoverForBuyerType"/> <xsd:element name="applyCoverForBuyerResponse" type="connect:CoverForBuyerResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="applyForIndication" type="connect:OperationCreditLimitType"/> <xsd:element name="applyForIndicationResponse" type="connect:ConnectResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="applyIndicationForBuyer" type="connect:OperationCoverForBuyerType"/> <xsd:element name="applyIndicationForBuyerResponse" type="connect:CoverForBuyerResponseType"/> <xsd:element name="ConnectException" type="connecterr:WSException"/> <!--Type Definition--> <xsd:complexType name="ConnectResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CoverDecision" type="connect:CoverDecisionType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OperationBasicType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="application" type="connect:BasicApplicationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OperationAmountType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="application" type="connect:AmountLimitApplicationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OperationCreditLimitType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="application" type="connect:CreditLimitApplicationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OperationSupersedBasicType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="application" type="connect:BasicSupersededApplicationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OperationSupersededAmountType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="application" type="connect:SupersededAmountLimitApplicationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OperationSupersededCreditLimitType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="application" type="connect:SupersededCreditLimitApplicationType"/> </xsd:sequence> <!--request--> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="OperationCoverForBuyerType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="application" type="connect:CoverForBuyerApplicationType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--response--> <xsd:complexType name="CoverForBuyerResponseType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ExternalCoverId" type="connect:ExternalApplicationIDType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>External CoverId will be same as in request , if External CoverId of the request is empty then a value will be generated</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://atradius.com/services/exception/_2006_12_15/exception" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ex="http://atradius.com/services/exception/_2006_12_15/exception"> <xs:complexType name="WSException"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="errorCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="errorDescription" type="xs:string" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="serverErrorReferenceToken" type="xs:string" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="values" type="ex:arrayWrapper" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="arrayWrapper"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="value" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2007 sp2 (http://www.altova.com) by Atradius (Atradius)--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://atradius.com/connect/_2007_08/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:connect="http://atradius.com/connect/_2007_08/" xmlns:organisation="http://atradius.com/organisation/_2007_08/type/"> <xsd:import namespace="http://atradius.com/organisation/_2007_08/type/" schemaLocation="Organisation.xsd"/> <!--Cover Decision--> <xsd:element name="CoverDecision" type="connect:CoverDecisionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Cover Decision returned by Atradius.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:complexType name="CoverDecisionType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Definition of Cover Decision.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ExternalCoverId" type="connect:ExternalApplicationIDType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>External identifier of the cover application. This can be filled with the id of the requestor.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Buyer" type="organisation:OrganisationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Company for which the cover is requested.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Customer" type="organisation:BasicOrganisationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Company requesting the application.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PolicyId" type="connect:PolicyIdType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of Atradius policy.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PolicyNr" type="connect:PolicyNrType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of policy</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="CreditCheckApplication" type="connect:BasicApplicationSummaryType"/> <xsd:element name="NoRiskOpinionApplication" type="connect:AmountLimitApplicationSummaryType"/> <xsd:element name="IndicationApplication" type="connect:AmountLimitApplicationSummaryType"/> <xsd:element name="CreditLimitApplication" type="connect:AmountLimitApplicationSummaryType"/> <xsd:element name="SpecialProductApplication" type="connect:AmountLimitApplicationSummaryType"/> <xsd:element name="GenericApplication" type="connect:BasicRequestSummaryType"/> </xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="Decision" type="connect:DecisionType"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="CoverId" type="connect:CoverIdType" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Atradius unique identifier of the cover decision. CoverId of rejections is 0. Please keep this as it is needed for cancellations and supersede requests.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> <xsd:attribute name="TypeOfCover" type="connect:CoverType" use="required"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of the cover decision.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ResultCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="Success"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Success indicator.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:enumeration> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="BasicRequestSummaryType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CustomerReference" type="connect:CustomerReferenceType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer reference for the application</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EntryDate" type="xsd:date"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date of the Cover requesrt</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Supersede" type="xsd:boolean"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>true = decision supersedes previous decision false = no supesrsede</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BasicApplicationSummaryType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:BasicRequestSummaryType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="SupersededCoverID" type="connect:CoverIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Atradius cover id of the decision that was superseded</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AppliedBuyer" type="organisation:OrganisationIdentifierType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Buyer Identifier used in the cover request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AmountLimitApplicationSummaryType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:BasicApplicationSummaryType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestedAmount" type="connect:AmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Requested amount for cover</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CurrencyCode" type="connect:CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency ISO code of the amount, is the Policy Currency</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectFromDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Effective from date of the application</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectToDate" type="xsd:date" default="4712-12-31" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Effective to date of the application</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ApplicationResultType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="25"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ApplicationErrorResult"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CreditCheckDecision"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CreditLimitDecision"/> <xsd:enumeration value="IndicationDecision"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NoRiskOpinionDecision"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SpecialProductDecision"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ReferedDecision"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ApplicationErrorResultType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="DecisionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ApplicationResult" type="connect:ApplicationResultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Result of the Application: Error Result or type of Decision</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DecisionDate" type="xsd:date"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Date of the decision or application entry date (referred decision)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectFrom" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Effective from date of the decision</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectTo" type="xsd:date"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Effetive to date of the decision</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PreviousCoverId" type="connect:CoverIdType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Atradius cover id of a previous decision</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="ApplicationErrorResult" type="connect:ApplicationErrorResultType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Code to indicate why the requested application has been rejected See Result Reference Table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CreditCheckDecision" type="connect:CreditCheckDecisionType"/> <xsd:element name="CreditLimitDecision" type="connect:CreditLimitDecisionType"/> <xsd:element name="NoRiskOpinionDecision" type="connect:CreditLimitDecisionType"/> <xsd:element name="IndicationDecision" type="connect:CreditLimitDecisionType"/> <xsd:element name="SpecialProductDecision" type="connect:CreditLimitDecisionType"/> <xsd:element name="ReferredDecision"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>This is used to indicate that the application has been referred to an Atradius underwriter. Optionally it can have a code when an application is transferred, superseded or cancelled.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CreditCheckDecisionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CreditCheckResultCode" type="connect:CreditCheckResultCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The result of the credit check decision CCP = Credit Check Positive CCN = Credit Check Negative</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DecisionCode" type="connect:DecisionCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Decision Code See Result Reference Table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CreditCheckResultCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CCP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CCN"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="CreditLimitDecisionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CreditLimitResultCode" type="connect:CreditLimitResultCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>APPR = Limit approved CDEC = Current decision unchanged ZERO = Limit refused</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DecisionCode" type="connect:DecisionCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Decision Code See Result Reference Table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Conditions" type="connect:ConditionsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="10"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Conditions for the Credit Limit</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="FirstAmount" type="connect:AmountLimitDecisionType"/> <xsd:element name="SecondAmount" type="connect:AmountLimitDecisionType" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CreditLimitResultCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> <xsd:enumeration value="APPR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CDEC"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ZERO"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="DecisionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ConditionsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TypeOfConditions" type="connect:TypeOfConditionsType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of the Condition ADMIN = administrative condition COVER = condition effecting the cover</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConditionCode" type="connect:ConditionCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Condition Code See Condition T-Codes and Variables Reference Table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConditionVars" type="connect:ConditionVarsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="10"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Condition Variable as it appears in the Condition Text</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ConditionText" type="connect:ConditionTextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Text of the condition in the policy language</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TypeOfConditionsType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="5"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ADMIN"/> <xsd:enumeration value="COVER"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ConditionCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ConditionTextType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="6000"/> <xsd:whiteSpace value="preserve"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ConditionVarsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TypeConditionVar" type="connect:TypeConditionVarType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of Condition Variable See Condition T-Codes and Variables Reference Table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ValueConditionVar" type="connect:ValueConditionVarType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Condition Variable Value</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="TypeConditionVarType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ISO"/> <xsd:enumeration value="POL"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ORG"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DAT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DATF"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DATP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NUM"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AMTI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AMTD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PCTI"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TEXT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="TOP"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PERD"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PERM"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ValueConditionVarType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="2000"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="AmountLimitDecisionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Amount" type="connect:AmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Credit Limit Amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Conditions" type="connect:ConditionsType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="10"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Conditions that apply to the amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Cover Application--> <xsd:complexType name="ApplicationDefinitionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CustomerId" type="connect:CustomerIdType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Atradius ID for company requesting the application</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CustomerNr" type="organisation:OrganisationIdentifierType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer Number for which the cover is requested</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PolicyId" type="connect:PolicyIdType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Atradius Policy ID</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PolicyNr" type="connect:PolicyNrType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of policy</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ExternalCoverId" type="connect:ExternalApplicationIDType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>External identifier of the CLA This can be filed with the requestor's id, Unique reference for each application regardless of whether it is on the same buyer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CustomerReference" type="connect:CustomerReferenceType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer reference for the application</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BasicApplicationType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:ApplicationDefinitionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Buyer" type="organisation:OrganisationIdentifierType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Company for which the cover is requested</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AmountLimitApplicationType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:BasicApplicationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestedAmount" type="connect:AmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Requested amount for cover</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CurrencyCode" type="connect:CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency ISO code of the requested amount, See Country and Currency Code Reference Table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectFromDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Request for cover starting date. If not entered the default date will be the system date</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectToDate" type="xsd:date" default="4712-12-31" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Request for cover end date</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MultipleCover" type="xsd:boolean" default="false" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Multiple credit limits allow more than one decision on the same buyer, this is set on your policy - please refer to your policy document</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CreditLimitApplicationType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:AmountLimitApplicationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Priority" type="connect:PriorityType" default="NORM" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Normal or High</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ExportDetails" type="connect:ExportDetailsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Export details For accelerating the underwriting process any details should be filled in even if fields are not mandatory
Mandatory for UK policies</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Notes" type="connect:NotesType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Please use this to add information that will support your application. If notes are prenent no automatic decision will be taken</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--Superseding application--> <xsd:complexType name="BasicSupersededApplicationType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:ApplicationDefinitionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Buyer" type="organisation:OrganisationIdentifierType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Company for which the cover is requested</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="SupersededCoverID" type="connect:CoverIdType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Atradius cover id of the credit limit that has to be suprseded</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SupersededAmountLimitApplicationType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:BasicSupersededApplicationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestedAmount" type="connect:AmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Requested amount for cover</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CurrencyCode" type="connect:CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency code for the requested amount</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectFromDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Requested cover starting date, default is the system date</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectToDate" type="xsd:date" default="4712-12-31" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Reuqested cover end date</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="SupersededCreditLimitApplicationType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:SupersededAmountLimitApplicationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Priority" type="connect:PriorityType" default="NORM" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>NORM = Normal HIGH = High</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ExportDetails" type="connect:ExportDetailsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Export details For accelerating the underwriting process any details should be filled in even if fields are not mandatory
Mandatory for UK policies</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Notes" type="connect:NotesType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Please use this to add information that will support your application. If notes are prenent no automatic decision will be taken</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--Element type--> <xsd:complexType name="ExportDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TermsOfPayment" type="connect:TermsOfPaymentType"/> <xsd:element name="PreCreditRisk" type="connect:PreCreditRiskType" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="AdvancePayments" type="xsd:boolean" default="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>default is false, true – advance payments to suppliers is involved in this contract</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ThirdCountry" type="xsd:boolean" default="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indication that the delivery is to a third world countr. If set to true Notes must be added to support the application</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AssociateCompany" type="xsd:boolean" default="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indication that the delivery is to an associate company</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="TermsOfPaymentType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="TermsOfPaymentPeriod" type="connect:TermsOfPaymentPeriodType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Terms of payment for the contract</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="TermsOfPaymentPeriodType" type="connect:TermsOfPaymentPeriodTypeType" default="DAYS"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unit of terms of payment period. Month, Days, Week, Quarter or Year, default is Days</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PreCreditRiskType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PreCreditRiskPeriod" type="connect:PreCreditRiskPeriodType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The terms of payment for part of the total contract which will be invoiced when despatching</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PreCreditRiskPeriodType" type="connect:PreCreditRiskPeriodTypeType" default="MONT"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The unit for the Pre Credit Risk Period. Month, Days, Week, Quarter or Year, default is Month</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PreCreditRiskAmount" type="connect:AmountType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Part of the total contract value which will be invoiced when despatching</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PreviousReceivedCoverIdType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CoverId" type="connect:CoverIdType" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Id of the cover decision that is received and processed succesfully</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="StopIndicator" type="xsd:boolean" default="false" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>true = response should not return a next cover decision false = if a decision is present, the next cover decision is returned</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="PolicyNrType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Id" type="connect:String25"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of policy</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="policyTypeIdentifier" type="connect:String25"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type for identifier such as 'SYMPH' see policy number types table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <!--Added : ApplyCoverForBuyer Operation--> <!--CoverForBuyerDetailsType--> <xsd:complexType name="CoverForBuyerDetailsType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:CoverForBuyerApplicationDefinitionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="BuyerDetails" type="connect:BuyerOrganisationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Company for which the cover is requested</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RequestorDetails" type="connect:RequestorType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Requestor's details</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--ends--> <!--BuyerOrganisationType--> <xsd:complexType name="BuyerOrganisationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Definition of Organisation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:BasicBuyerOrganisationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="LegalForm" type="organisation:LegalFormType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Legal Form of the organisation, See Legal Form Reference Table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Address" type="connect:BuyerAddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address of the organisation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BasicBuyerOrganisationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Identifier" type="organisation:OrganisationIdentifierType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique identifiers of the organisation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Name" type="connect:BuyerNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the organisation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--ends--> <!--CoverApplicationDefinitionType--> <xsd:complexType name="CoverForBuyerApplicationDefinitionType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="CustomerId" type="connect:CustomerIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer Number for which the cover is requested</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PolicyNr" type="connect:PolicyNrType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of policy</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ApplicationDate" type="xsd:date"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Request for cover application date,Required field</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ExternalCoverId" type="connect:ExternalApplicationIDType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>External identifier of the CLA This can be filed with the requestor's id, Unique reference for each application regardless of whether it is on the same buyer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CustomerReference" type="connect:CustomerReferenceType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Customer reference for the cover application</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--ends--> <!--Added--> <xsd:complexType name="RequestorType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestorName" type="connect:RequestorNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Requestor name for cover application</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RequestorPhoneNumber" type="connect:PhoneNumberType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>+, Country Code, Area Code , Subscriber number example â€˜+33663104456â€™</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--ends--> <!--CoverForBuyerApplicationDetailsType--> <xsd:complexType name="CoverForBuyerApplicationDetailsType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:CoverForBuyerDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:choice> <xsd:element name="CreditLimitApplication" type="connect:CoverForBuyerCreditLimitType"/> </xsd:choice> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="CoverForBuyerCreditLimitType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="RequestedAmount" type="connect:AmountType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Requested amount for cover, Required field</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CurrencyCode" type="connect:CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Currency ISO code of the requested amount, See Country and Currency Code Reference Table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectFromDate" type="xsd:date" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Request for cover starting date. If not entered the default date will be the system date</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="EffectToDate" type="xsd:date" default="4712-12-31" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Request for cover end date</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="MultipleCover" type="xsd:boolean" default="false" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Multiple credit limits allow more than one decision on the same buyer, this is set on your policy - please refer to your policy document</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--ends--> <!--CoverForBuyerApplication--> <xsd:complexType name="CoverForBuyerApplicationType"> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="connect:CoverForBuyerApplicationDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Priority" type="connect:PriorityType" default="NORM" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Normal or High</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ExportDetails" type="connect:ExportDetailsType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Export details For accelerating the underwriting process any details should be filled in even if fields are not mandatory
Mandatory for UK policies</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Notes" type="connect:NotesType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Please use this to add information that will support your application. If notes are prenent no automatic decision will be taken</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <!--ends--> <xsd:simpleType name="TermsOfPaymentPeriodType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:totalDigits value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="TermsOfPaymentPeriodTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MONT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DAYS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WEEK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QUAR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="YEAR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PreCreditRiskPeriodType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:integer"> <xsd:totalDigits value="6"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PreCreditRiskPeriodTypeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> <xsd:enumeration value="MONT"/> <xsd:enumeration value="DAYS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="WEEK"/> <xsd:enumeration value="QUAR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="YEAR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="NotesType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="2000"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Common definitions for Atradius Cover--> <xsd:simpleType name="ExternalApplicationIDType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="15"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CustomerReferenceType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="25"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CurrencyCodeType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="AmountType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"> <xsd:totalDigits value="23"/> <xsd:fractionDigits value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CoverIdType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Atradius unique identifier of the cover decision.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:long"> <xsd:totalDigits value="12"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CustomerIdType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:long"> <xsd:totalDigits value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PolicyIdType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:long"> <xsd:totalDigits value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="MailboxIdType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:long"> <xsd:totalDigits value="8"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PriorityType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NORM"/> <xsd:enumeration value="HIGH"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="CoverType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="15"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CreditCheck"/> <xsd:enumeration value="NoRiskOpinion"/> <xsd:enumeration value="CreditLimit"/> <xsd:enumeration value="SpecialProduct"/> <xsd:enumeration value="Indication"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="String25"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="25"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <!--Added--> <xsd:simpleType name="RequestorNameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="PhoneNumberType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> <xsd:pattern value="[+]?[0-9]+"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="BuyerNameType"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="105"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="String035"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:minLength value="1"/> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="String10"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="10"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="BuyerAddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="StreetDescription" type="connect:BuyerNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Street.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="City" type="organisation:String35" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>City.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PostCode" type="connect:String10" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Postcode, if exist</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RegionName" type="organisation:String20" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the region/state, if exist</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryISOCode" type="organisation:CountryISOCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ISO code of the country.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--ends--> </xsd:schema>

<!--edited with XMLSpy v2007 sp2 (http://www.altova.com) by Atradius (Atradius)--> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://atradius.com/organisation/_2007_08/type/" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:organisation="http://atradius.com/organisation/_2007_08/type/"> <!--Definition of common types--> <xsd:include schemaLocation="CommonTypes.xsd"/> <!--Organisation Definition--> <xsd:complexType name="OrganisationType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Definition of Organisation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:complexContent> <xsd:extension base="organisation:BasicOrganisationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="LegalForm" type="organisation:LegalFormType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Legal Form of the organisation, See Legal Form Reference Table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Address" type="organisation:AddressType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Address of the organisation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:extension> </xsd:complexContent> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="BasicOrganisationType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Identifier" type="organisation:OrganisationIdentifierType" maxOccurs="10"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique identifiers of the organisation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Name" type="organisation:OrganisationNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the organisation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://atradius.com/organisation/_2007_08/type/" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:organisation="http://atradius.com/organisation/_2007_08/type/"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Common definition of basic types.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:simpleType name="LegalFormType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Legal form.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="4"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="OrganisationNameType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Definition of organisation name.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="name" type="organisation:String105"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name by which an organisation is known.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="type" type="organisation:String3" default="REG" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type of the name, REG is registered name</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <!--Common Basic Type--> <xsd:complexType name="OrganisationIdentifierType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="id" type="organisation:String35"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifier of the organisation.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="countryTypeIdentifier" type="organisation:CountryISOCodeType" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Country ISO code, mandatory attribute if registeredOffice is not 'SYMPH'.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:attribute name="registeredOffice" type="organisation:String20"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Type for identifier, COC, VA, SR, FC see Registered Office and VAT code reference table</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:attribute> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="AddressType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="StreetDescription" type="organisation:String105" maxOccurs="3"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Street.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="City" type="organisation:String35"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>City.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="PostCode" type="organisation:String35" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Postcode, if exist</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="RegionName" type="organisation:String20" minOccurs="0"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Name of the region/state, if exist</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="CountryISOCode" type="organisation:CountryISOCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>ISO code of the country.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="CountryISOCodeType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Definition of the country's ISO code.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="String3"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="3"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="String20"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="20"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="String35"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="35"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="String80"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="80"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="String105"> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:maxLength value="105"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> </xsd:schema>

con:property.con:name: query
con:property.con:value: SELECT tcl.ORBUD_ORNNN_ID,tcl.bupiy_id,tcl.ORCUR_ORNNN_ID FROM tbor_non_ncm_organisations tnno, tbbu_policies tb, tbbu_credit_limits tcl WHERE TCL.BUPIY_ID = tb.id AND TNNO.ID = TCL.ORBUD_ORNNN_ID and tb.mcl_flag='Y' and tcl.effect_to_dat>sysdate and rownum<2
